title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.105 - Any material referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.105 - Any material referenced to this section

State Regulations
(a) Any material listed in section
1211.150
and referenced to this
section may or may not be an oxidizing material. When it is not identified by
the prescribed D.O.T. caution label for dangerous articles and is known not to
meet the description of a dangerous article, the article is allowed passage
provided the shipping order, bill of lading, or other shipping paper shows the
following certification: "This shipment conforms to Port Authority of New York
and New Jersey rules for the transportation of explosives and other dangerous
articles via its tunnels, the G.W.B. Lower Level and G.W.B. Expressway."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
